      • length

        public double length()

        Returns:
        length of vector in meters

      • distance

        public double distance(Location l)
        Determines the distance between a location and this vector. Looks for a line between the location that is orthogonal to the line representing the vector. If the intersection with the line would actually be before or after the vector then the distance from the location to the corresponding end point of the vector is returned. But if the intersection of the orthogonal line to the vector line is within the vector then the length of the orthogonal line is returned.
        Parameters:
        l - The location
        Returns:
        Distance from location parameter to the vector

      • matchDistanceAlongVector

        public double matchDistanceAlongVector(Location l)
        Returns length along vector where this location is closest to the vector.
        Parameters:
        l -
        Returns:
        Distance along the vector that the location best matches

      • angle

        public double angle()
        Returns the angle in radians of the vector from the equator. Note that this is very different from heading().
        Returns:

      • heading

        public double heading()
        Returns number of degrees clockwise from due North. Note that this is very different from angle().
        Returns:

      • locAlongVector

        public Location locAlongVector(double length)

        Returns:

      • beginning

        public Vector beginning(double beginningLength)

      • end

        public Vector end(double beginningLength)
        Returns the last part of the vector, starting after the beginningLength
        Parameters:
        beginningLength - The length after which the resulting vector is to be returned.
        Returns:

      • middle

        public Vector middle(double length1,
            double length2)
        Returns the middle of this vector that starts at length1 and ends at length2. The resulting length should be length2-length1.
        Parameters:
        length1 -
        length2 -
        Returns:
